alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga; Oswego; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 01 at 7:24AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF OSWEGO... WAYNE...AND NORTHERN CAYUGA COUNTIES THROUGH THE MORNING COMMUTE... A band of lake effect snow will bring minor accumulations through the morning commute. Accumulations will mostly be on grassy surfaces, but some untreated roads could become snow covered and slick, especially bridges and overpasses. Snowfall amounts this morning will vary, with generally a trace to one inch in lower elevations, and up to 2 inches across higher terrain. Visibility may be reduced to a mile or less at times. Snow is expected to taper off by late morning. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Oswego, Fulton, Sandy Island Beach State Park, Fair Haven Beach State Park, Ontario, Williamson, Marion, Pulaski, Central Square, Sodus, Cato, Selkirk Shores State Park, Chimney Bluffs State Park, Mexico Point State Park, Nine Mile Point, Battle Island State Park, Brewerton, Hastings, Walworth, and Scriba. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 32 and 36. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
